full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/14/2023 U.S. Department of Justice OMB # 1115-0053 Immigration and Naturalization Service (IN Application for Permane Residence DO NOT WRITE IN THIS BLOCK Case ID# Action Stamp Fee Stamp A# G-28 or Volag# APPROVIDL Section of Law Eligibility Under Sec. 245 Sec. 209(b). INA DEC 01/1992 Sec. 214(d), INA Dependent of Principal Sec. 13, Act of 9/11/57 C 234507 ALS DISTRICT DIRECTOR Approved Visa Petition Adten DIS Special Immigrant Sec. 245, INA Other Sec. 249, INA Country Chargeable 1639 Preference A. Reason for this application I am applying for lawful permanent residence for the following reason: (check the box that applies) 1. An Immigrant visa number is immediately available to me because A visa petition has already been approved for me (approval notice is attached) A visa petition is being filed with this application 2. I entered as the flance(e) of a U.S. citizen and married within 90 days (approval notice and marriage certificate are attached) 3. I am an asylee eligible for adjustment 4. Other: I am the dependent of my daughter, a US citizen, living in Mia, Fla B. Information about you 1. Name (Family name in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 11. On what date did you last enter the U.S.? VAUGUES Marie CECILE JUNE 28, 1991 2. Address (Number and Street) (Apartment Number) 12. Where did you last enter the U.S.? (City and State) 681 NW 102nd COURT MIAMI FLORIDA (Town or City) (State/Country) (ZIP/Postal Code) 13. What means of travel did you use? (Plane, car. etc.) MIAMI FLORIDA 33172 PLANE 3. Place of Birth (Town or City) (State/Country) 14. Were you inspected by a U.S. immigration officer? CAP. HAITIEN HAITI Yes No 4. Date of Birth 5. Sex 6. Marital Status 15. In what status did you last enter the U.S.? (Mo/Day/Yr) Male Married (Visitor, student, exchange alien, crewman, temporary worker, 6/16/1898 Single without inspection, etc.) VISITOR Female Widowed Divorced 7. Social Security Number 8. Alien Registration Number (if any) 16. Give your name EXACTLY as It appears on your Arrival/Departure N/A A 72-044147 Record (Form 1-94). CECILE VAUGUES 9. Country of Citizenship HAiTi 17. Arrival/Departure Record (I-94) Number 18. Visa Number 10. Have you ever applied for permanent resident status in the U.S.? 173 36221102 007629 Yes No (If Yes, give the date and place of filing and final disposition) 19. At what Consulate was your nonimmigrant visa issued? Date PORT-AU- PRINCE, HAITY (Mo/Day/Yr) 6/1$/91 20. Have you ever been married before? Yes No If Yes, (Names of prior husbands/wives) (Country of citizenship) (Date marriage ended) 21. Has your husband/wife ever been married before? Yes No If Yes, (Names of prior husbands/wives) (Country of citizenship) (Date marriage ended) INITIAL RECEIPT RESUBMITTED RELOCATED COMPLETED Rec'd Sent Approved Denied Returned FORM I-485 (REV. 2-27-87)N
